settings.custom_liquid:
2022 is a tough year for growth. To allow our employees to have a pleasant paid holiday while we perform factory automation upgrades, several of our warehouses and factories in East Asia will be closed for up to a month this year. For orders placed on or after January 17th for non-stock items, we will start shipping in late February.

To make up for your wait, we will send you a complimentary accessory and a $20 no-threshold discount coupon with your package.

Dear trendsetters, The Supermade thank you for your company and we will continue to strive to provide you with excellent service and trendy clothing in the future.

settings.content:
Free socks for order over $99

Free necklace for order over $129

Free Bracelet for order over $199

Free Tee for order over $239

Apply for all product on site. Buy more gift bigger!

Note: The offer cannot be used together with other promotion offers.
We want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. Items can be returned or exchanged within 30 days of delivery.

settings.code:
<script>
    var ua = navigator.userAgent;
    var ipad = ua.match(/(iPad).*OS\s([\d_]+)/),
    isIphone = !ipad && ua.match(/(iPhone\sOS)\s([\d_]+)/),
    isAndroid = ua.match(/(Android)\s+([\d.]+)/),
    isMobile = isIphone || isAndroid;
  
    window.Cloud = {
      language: 'en',
      device: isMobile ? 'M':'pc',
      COUNTRY_CODE: $('.currency-option').val(),    
      sitename:'48806'
    }
  </script>
  <script src="//cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0610/7208/1122/t/24/assets/op-analytics.js?v=118671256134864980591657855836753"></script>      
  <script type="text/javascript">     
    (function(){
        // let timer = setInterval(()=>{
        //     $('.product-recommendations .swiper-slide').find('a').each(function(){
        //         let $a = $(this);
        //         $a.attr({'target':'_blank'});
        //         clearInterval(timer);
        //     })
            
        // },500)
        
    })()  
    var OPDataReport = function(opts) {
        this.initializeVariables()
        typeof jQuery !== 'undefined' && typeof OPAnalytics !== 'undefined' && this.init()
    }
  
    OPDataReport.vars = {}
  
    OPDataReport.prototype = {
        constructor: OPDataReport,
        initializeVariables: function() {
            var vals = OPDataReport.vars
            for (var name in vals) {
                if (vals.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
                    this[name] = vals[name]
                }
            }
        },
        
        detailDataReport: function() {
            var menu = $('.product-single__title').text();          
            OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'supermade:detail_youmayalsolike_exposure',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'window',
                targetEl: '.product-recommendations .swiper-slide',
                action: 'EXPOSE',
                desc: '',
                hostname: ''
            })
            OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'supermade:detail_youmayalsolike_click',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'document',
                targetEl: '.product-recommendations .swiper-slide',
                action: 'CLICK',
                desc: '',
                hostname: ''
            })  
            OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'supermade:detail_product_view',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'document',
                targetEl: '',
                action: 'VIEW',
                desc: $('#productSpu').val() || '',
                hostname: ''
            })
            OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'supermade:detail_addtocart_click',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'document',
                targetEl: '.add-to-cart',
                action: 'CART',
                desc: 'add to cart',
                hostname: ''
            })
            if(Cloud.device === 'M') {
                OPAnalytics.track({
                    name: 'supermade:detail_scrolltop_click',
                    url: window.location.href,
                    sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                    page: 'detail',
                    menu: menu,
                    bindedEl: 'document',
                    targetEl: '#scroll-to-top-button',
                    action: 'CLICK',
                    desc: 'scroll to top',
                    hostname: ''
                })
            }
        },
  
        init: function() {
            var self = this;
            $(document).ready(function() {
              // 根据URL判断页面类型 执行对应的埋点
                
  
              // goods detail
              self.detailDataReport();
              window.currentPage = 'detail'
              
            })
        }
    }
    new OPDataReport();
  
    (function() {
        if(typeof Utils !== 'undefined') {
            var utmArr = ["utm_source", "utm_medium", "utm_campaign", "utm_term", "utm_adset", "utm_content", "browser_mode"];
            var i, utils;
            var queryObj = Utils.getGet()
            for (i=0; i< utmArr.length; i++) {
                var item = utmArr[i]
                if(typeof Utils === 'function') {
                    utils = new Utils();
                } else {
                    utils = Utils;
                }
                if(queryObj[item]) {
                    utils.setCookie(item, queryObj[item], 86400 * 7)
                }
            }
        }
    })();
  </script>
